article.title: Raytheon's Miniature Air Launched Decoy Contract Modified
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Raytheon Missile Company, Tucson, Arizona, is being awarded a nearly $83 million contract modification for the Miniature Air Launched Decoy low rate initial production lot four. Air Armament Center, Eglin Air Force Base, Florida, is the contracting activity.
